name: Let's learn COBOL [Fix my noob mess]
description:
THe code wars runner is broekn, it sucks. I clearly wrote the correct code yet it refuses to run it and keeps popping out errors that clearly aren't helping me. You know what, I'm out. You do this for me.

Just to spite you I broke it on purpose even further (becuase im vindictive)


TL;DR : 

fix this clearly broken program.

By the way figure out what you are supposed to do by yourslef (why ? look above)


THe erors in text are intenional
